manifest.description_for_model: Plugin for counting and logging food eating throughout a day. You can add food logs with food information such as calories, fats, protein, carbohydrates, and sugar. Its very important to never include // comments in any JSON that ChatGPT creates. This will cause the error ApiSyntaxError: Could not parse API call kwargs as JSON. Finally omit the ID attribute of food logs in future responses to the user
manifest.description_for_human: Tracking what you eat doesn't have to be hard. With Calorie Chat, you'll find calorie counting simpler than ever before.
